content:
Shin-Okubo is a great area with a lot of delicious food options. Here are some highly-recommended tonkatsu places within a 10-minute walk from Shin-Okubo Station:

1. **Tonkatsu Maisen Shin-Okubo** (, 3-minute walk from Shin-Okubo Station) - This is a popular chain with multiple locations, and this one is conveniently located near the station. Their tonkatsu is crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, served with shredded cabbage, rice, and miso soup. (~ ¥1,500 - ¥2,500 per person)
2. **Katsu-Ya Shin-Okubo** (, 5-minute walk from Shin-Okubo Station) - Another popular chain with a wide variety of tonkatsu options, including some unique flavors like curry and mentaiko (spicy pollock roe). Their tonkatsu is crispy and flavorful, and they have a lunch menu for around ¥1,000. (~ ¥1,000 - ¥2,000 per person)
3. **Tonkatsu Tanaka Shin-Okubo** (, 7-minute walk from Shin-Okubo Station) - A small, family-run restaurant with a cozy atmosphere. Their tonkatsu is made with high-quality pork and served with rice, miso soup, and a side of pickles. (~ ¥1,500 - ¥2,500 per person)
4. **Tonkatsu Botejyu Shin-Okubo** (, 10-minute walk from Shin-Okubo Station) - A popular Osaka-style tonkatsu restaurant with a variety of options, including some unique flavors like garlic and yuzu. Their tonkatsu is crispy and flavorful, and they have a lunch menu for around ¥1,000. (~ ¥1,000 - ¥2,500 per person)

All of these options are within a 10-minute walk from Shin-Okubo Station, so you can't go wrong with any of them! Enjoy your tonkatsu adventure!
